summary.span: 提供安全執行緒集合適用的封鎖和界限容量，這個集合會實作 。

span.span: Provides blocking and bounding capabilities for thread-safe collections that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是安全執行緒集合類別，提供下列功能： is a thread-safe collection class that provides the following: - 實作生產者/消費者模式;是包裝函式介面。An implementation of the producer/consumer pattern; is a wrapper for the interface. - 並行的新增和移除的項目從具有多個執行緒和方法。Concurrent addition and removal of items from multiple threads with the and methods. - 繫結的集合，其中會封鎖和full 或 empty 集合時的作業。A bounded collection that blocks and operations when the collection is full or empty. - 取消或是透過作業物件或方法。Cancellation of or operations by using a object in the or method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 另請注意，方法不是安全執行緒。Also, note that the method is not thread-safe. 所有公用和受保護的其他成員是安全執行緒，且可能會從多個執行緒同時使用。All other public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads. 表示允許安全執行緒新增和移除資料的集合。 represents a collection that allows for thread-safe adding and removal of data. 做為包裝函式執行個體，並允許將嘗試從集合移除封鎖，直到資料可被移除為止。 is used as a wrapper for an instance, and allows removal attempts from the collection to block until data is available to be removed. 同樣地，您可以建立若要強制執行資料元素中允許的數目上限; 新增至集合的嘗試再封鎖，直到空間可用來儲存新增的項目。Similarly, you can create a to enforce an upper bound on the number of data elements allowed in the ; addition attempts to the collection may then block until space is available to store the added items. 如此一來，在是傳統封鎖佇列的資料結構，類似，不同之處在於基礎資料儲存機制抽象化為。In this manner, is similar to a traditional blocking queue data structure, except that the underlying data storage mechanism is abstracted away as an . 支援界限和封鎖。 supports bounding and blocking. 週框表示您可以設定集合的最大容量。Bounding means that you can set the maximum capacity of the collection. 週框是特定案例中很重要，因為它可讓您控制記憶體中集合的大小上限，而且它會防止產生執行緒移太遠之前使用的執行緒。多個執行緒或工作可以將項目加入集合，並產生的執行緒如果集合已達到其指定的最大容量，將會封鎖，直到移除項目。Bounding is important in certain scenarios because it enables you to control the maximum size of the collection in memory, and it prevents the producing threads from moving too far ahead of the consuming threads.Multiple threads or tasks can add items to the collection concurrently, and if the collection reaches its specified maximum capacity, the producing threads will block until an item is removed. 多位消費者可以同時移除項目，如果集合變成空的，則會在生產者新增項目之前封鎖使用執行緒。Multiple consumers can remove items concurrently, and if the collection becomes empty, the consuming threads will block until a producer adds an item. 產生執行緒可以呼叫方法，以表示將會加入任何其他項目。A producing thread can call the method to indicate that no more items will be added. 消費者會監視 屬性，以得知集合何時變成空的，以及何時無法再新增項目。Consumers monitor the property to know when the collection is empty and no more items will be added. 和作業通常會在迴圈中。 and operations are typically performed in a loop. 您可以藉由傳入取消迴圈物件至或方法，並核取的權杖值每個反覆運算上的屬性。You can cancel a loop by passing in a object to the or method, and then checking the value of the token's property on each iteration. 如果值為`true`，它可以決定是否要清除任何資源並結束迴圈，以回應取消要求。If the value is `true`, it is up to you to respond the cancellation request by cleaning up any resources and exiting the loop. 當您建立物件，您可以指定界限的容量不僅集合型別使用。When you create a object, you can specify not only the bounded capacity but also the type of collection to use. 例如，您可以針對先進先出 (FIFO) 行為指定 物件，或針對後進先出 (LIFO) 行為指定 物件。For example, you could specify a object for first in, first out (FIFO) behavior, or a object for last in, first out (LIFO) behavior. 您可以使用任何可實作 介面的集合類別。You can use any collection class that implements the interface. 的預設集合類型為 。The default collection type for is . 請勿直接修改基礎集合。Do not modify the underlying collection directly. 使用方法來新增或移除項目。Use methods to add or remove elements. 物件會損毀，如果您直接變更基礎的集合。The object can become corrupted if you change the underlying collection directly. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何新增和擷取封鎖回收中同時的項目：The following example shows how to add and take items concurrently from a blocking collection: [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Concurrent.BlockingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.blockingcollection/cs/blockingcoll.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Concurrent.BlockingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.blockingcollection/vb/blockingcoll.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks CopyTo 代表及時在精準的點集合的快照集。CopyTo represents a snapshot of the collection at a precise point in time. 如果新增或移除項目，而 CopyTo 執行其他執行緒，CopyTo 所傳回的項目可能不會構成集合的狀態。If other threads are adding or removing items while CopyTo is executing, then the elements returned by CopyTo might not represent the state of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose`方法不是安全執行緒。The `Dispose` method is not thread-safe. `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.
